rooms.description: Spacious Scandinavian-style living area with a focal central hearth and expansive windows for natural light. Walls are painted in neutral hues to enhance calmness.
Open dining space with a minimalist Scandinavian design, complementing the living area. Features a large table and natural lighting from adjacent windows.
Modern kitchen designed with stainless steel appliances and ample storage. The layout ensures easy workflow, incorporating natural ventilation.
Elevated Scandinavian entrance hall with a minimalist decor and integrated storage for coats and accessories. Natural light through frosted glass windows.

openings.description: Double-glazed door with an integrated security system, allowing for natural ventilation and adherence to Vastu principles.
Large balcony window ensuring ample natural light in the living area and dining zone.
Rooflight integrated into the central ceiling for enhanced natural light and ventilation.
Dedicated access door to the swimming pool area, ensuring security and privacy.
Separate door leading to the library space integrated within the living area for quiet reading and study.
Window with frosted glass to maintain privacy in the library while allowing natural light.

rooms.description: Master bedroom with Scandinavian design, featuring a large ensuite bathroom, walk-in closet, and ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows.
Secondary bedroom designed with minimalist Scandinavian decor and integrated storage solutions.
Additional bedroom providing a serene space for relaxation, featuring large windows to maximize natural light.
Fourth bedroom that maintains the overall Scandinavian aesthetic with functional design and ample space for personal use.
Spacious ensuite bathroom featuring modern fixtures, natural light, and ventilation with frosted windows for privacy.

openings.description: Large window in the master bedroom ensuring abundant natural light and adherence to Vastu principles.
Balcony window providing extra ventilation and natural light to the upper floor.
Additional rooflight on the upper floor to enhance natural light and maintain ventilation across bedrooms.
Sliding door connecting the master bedroom to the ensuite bathroom, promoting ease of access and privacy.
Interior door from bedroom_master to bedroom_2, ensuring smooth flow and connectivity.
Interior door from bedroom_master to bedroom_3 for ease of access.
Interior door connecting the master bedroom to the fourth bedroom, maintaining consistency in design.
Dedicated closet door integrated within the master bedroom for easy access.

rooms.description: Cozy library designed with Scandinavian elements, featuring built-in bookshelves and a reading nook. Natural light is optimized via frosted windows.
Open deck area integrated with the penthouse roof, providing panoramic views and ample space for relaxation or social gatherings.

openings.description: Large window on the penthouse roof to maximize natural light and ventilation in both library and deck areas.
Access door from the penthouse interior to the open deck, designed with minimalist Scandinavian style.
Frosted glass window in the library area ensuring privacy while allowing natural light.
